import './CalcForm.css'; import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; class CalcForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {} } componentDidMount() { } onThroughputSelectChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target; this.setState({ [name]: value }); this.render(); } ; render() { let thruDisplay; console.log(this.state.throughput) if (this.state.throughput==="msgsec") { thruDisplay = "
\n

The following are optional parameters for estimating the minimum number of partitions required for a topic. This estimation will be skipped if any of the following fields are left at zero (0).









); } } export default CalcForm;
